name: Intent Classifier
description: Conservative, precise pre-processor that converts a raw user prompt into a structured intent signal. Produces intent_class, meta_intent, domain_details, entities[], and confidence for downstream graph routing by the Planner. Extracts only user-facing semantic concepts — no tool names, data sources, or technical mappings.

extensions.description: Declares per-skill JSON Schema input/output contracts. Schema definitions are in the agent documentation at documentationUrl.

httpAuthSecurityScheme.description: Bearer token — placeholder, replace with real scheme at implementation time

skills.name: Classify Intent
skills.description: Parses the raw user prompt and optional context key-values, then writes a fully structured intent signal to STATE.intent. Emits exactly one intent_class, a meta_intent for conversation-level routing, domain_details (assessment goal, scope, urgency), and a typed entities[] array extracted from user language only. Assigns a 0-1 confidence score. When intent is ambiguous (confidence < 0.5), sets intent_class to unknown_or_needs_clarification and generates a targeted clarification_question; the graph short-circuits and returns the question to the user before the Planner runs.
examples: Provide me a summary of the configuration best practice assessment, show the top 5 issues.
Check security vulnerabilities on production network devices at Site-A.
The latest assessment has SLIC findings for DataCenter-1 — what do the critical ones mean?
Show me critical findings from last week at DataCenter-1.
What changed in the latest assessment compared to the previous one?
How should I configure BGP route filtering to follow best practices?

notes: url, provider.url, and documentationUrl are placeholder values. Replace with real endpoints before implementation.
securitySchemes.bearerAuth is a placeholder. Replace with the actual scheme (OAuth2, OIDC, mTLS, ApiKey, etc.) at implementation time. See A2A spec section 4.5 Security Objects.
capabilities.extensions[skill-schema] URI is a placeholder. The referenced spec document must define per-skill input/output JSON Schemas. See documentationUrl.

Intent Classifier extracts user-facing semantic entities only (site, device, environment, timeframe, severity, assessment_type, output_format). It must NOT extract tool names, data sources, database identifiers, or any implementation-level detail.

intent_class values: cbp_assessment (assessment results/findings/stats/trends), cbp_expert_insights (SLIC findings requiring enterprise knowledge enrichment), cbp_generic (general config/BP question — linguistic signals), security_assessment, unknown_or_needs_clarification. When unknown_or_needs_clarification is emitted, clarification_question is populated and the graph short-circuits (Planner does not run).
meta_intent values: new_topic, followup_question, clarification_request, acknowledgement, confirmation, cancellation, escalation.
